instructions: Boil spaghetti. In a separate bowl, mix eggs and cheese. Fry pancetta. Combine all with pasta.
Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices. Cook onions and tomatoes. Add chicken and simmer.
Cook beef and onions in butter. Add mushrooms and sour cream. Simmer until cooked.
Stir fry vegetables in oil. Add soy sauce and ginger. Cook until vegetables are tender.
Grill fish fillets. Warm tortillas. Top with fish, cabbage, lime juice, and sour cream.
Spread tomato sauce on dough. Add mozzarella and basil. Bake until crust is golden.
Mix all ingredients. Drop spoonfuls onto baking sheet. Bake until golden brown.
Toss lettuce with croutons, cheese, and dressing.
Mix flour, milk, eggs, and baking powder. Cook on griddle. Serve with syrup.
Mash avocados. Mix with lime juice, onions, tomatoes, and cilantro.
Cook beef. Fill taco shells with beef, lettuce, cheese, and salsa.
Layer noodles, meat, sauce, and cheeses. Bake until bubbly.
Grill chicken. Wrap in tortillas with lettuce, cheese, and dressing.
Cook tomatoes, onions, and garlic. Blend with basil and cream.
